meanings.definition: To anoint or smear with a substance
meanings.sent1: She was arointing the bread with butter for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The chef arointed the steak with a delicious sauce.
meanings.sent3: The kids were arointing each other with paint during art class.
meanings.sent4: The artist arointed the canvas with vibrant colors, creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The gardener arointed the plants with fertilizer to help them grow.

meanings.definition: Used as an exclamation to drive away someone or something
meanings.sent1: Arointing! Get out of here, pesky flies!
meanings.sent2: Arointing! The cat hissed at the squirrel in the garden.
meanings.sent3: Arointing! The children shouted as they chased away the birds from the picnic.
meanings.sent4: Arointing! The magician waved his wand to make the rabbit disappear.
meanings.sent5: Arointing! The scarecrow seemed to say to the crows as they flew away.
